title: Teach me Talkback
instructions_button_label: Baton, instructions. Double-tap to hear di instructions
tutorial2_go_back_instr1: To go back, swipe down then left with one finger in a continuous action. If multi-gestures are enabled, swipe with two fingers from the left or right side of the screen.
tutorial2_scrolling_instr1: Fun fun ki o le jẹga gii suuru, ka iboji meji pẹlu akẹkọ ni ọdun dundun, ni emi wa ni opolopo wọn jo sipe. Fun fun ki o le jẹga lọ nigbakan. Fun fun ki o jẹ iran miiran, tẹ ni oju kan nla tita ni ori miiran ayọkọ ti odo yii, ni emi wa ni iran didara.
tutorial2_scrolling_instr2: To scroll right, swipe left with two fingers. To scroll left, swipe with two fingers in the opposite direction. To finish, tap the Finish button at the far right of this page.
tutorial2_explore_menu_instr1: Welkom! For dis mimbu, you go larn how to use explore by touch. You fit chuku diferent elements by hold ya fingertip for screen and dey move am join anoda element wey you wan chuku. To finis dis lesson, use explore by touch to find di Finish Lesson button. No forget say make you dey drag ya fingertip for any direction slowly for screen, and make sure say ya fingertip dey touch screen all di time. You fit start now.
tutorial2_adjust_slider_instr1: Welcome, for dis module, you go learn as to increase and decrease di value of slider. Slider na small line wey contain value wey dey between minimum and maximum. People dey use sliders to change time. For example: song times or video times. You fit dey use slider take change di volume of dis phone. To start, you go try increase di value of di slider. To increase di value, swipe up. To continue, increase di value of di slider to 100%
tutorial2_adjust_slider_instr2: Now we will try and move the slider back down. To do this swipe down with one finger to reduce the value. Continue until the value is back to 50%
tutorial2_adjust_slider_instr3: Anoda way to change di volume na by double tap and hold di slider. From here, you fit swipe left and right to adjust am for dat direction. Try dey come back to 100%
tennis_ball_desc: Dis extra duty tennis ball na for longer play on di courts. Perfect for all levels of tournament and recreational play.
basketball_desc: Dis baskеtbol don dey for play inside or outside. E folow deep kanal dezin fоf easier hand alajment and bal kontrol.
soccer_ball_desc: Diz soccer bal na di wọn dae use for indor or outdor plei.
baseball_desc: This baseball has a cork core and a leather cover.
football_desc: Dis futbol na ideal for recreational play or practice. E get leather cover for durability and na deep pebble surface for grip.
train_set_desc: This train set is ideal for children. It features a train, tracks, and a station.
doll_desc: This doll is ideal for children. It can be dressed up in different outfits. Outfits sold separately.
unicorn_plush_desc: Dis unicorn plush dey good sotey children. E dey soft and fit for hugg.
plastic_castle_desc: Contain multiple pieces to build a castle including walls, towers, and a gate. For pikin wey don reach 3 years. Choking hazard.
tutorial2_practical_instr1: Great job! You opened up the on screen virtual keyboard. Explore by touch to type hello using the keyboard.
tutorial2_practical_instr2: Rememba say you fit slide left to entire one kain item for back, slide right to entire another one kain item for front, and tap double tap to activate one side of the tin. TO interact with beta wey dem dey call slider, find the slider wen you see am and slide am up oooooooooo arrange am anyhow you like.
tutorial3_challenge_instr1: Welcome to Lesson 3's challenge. In this challenge you go see page wit baking recipes. Feel free to navigate through the different page elements using the appropriate reading controls. To complete the challenge, navigate to the cookie recipe and check the checkbox for the following ingredient … 1 egg
tutorial3_challenge_cookie_description: Dis yammy and cheful chocolate-chip cuki risipi go entail to satisfy your swwit tuut!
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_description: Dis gooey brownie recipe na wan wey everybodi like and e dey quick and easy to make!
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_ingred3: 3 eggs, de luk na whisk am small small
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_ingred4: 1 and ½ cups of white sugar
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_ingred6: ¼ cup of Dutch cocoa powder
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_step1: Step 1: Preheat oven to 180C or 160C fan forced. Grease a 20cm square cake pan and line with baking paper.
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_step2: Step 2: Wé put ọyinbọ àlùbatúbọ ati edo ẹyin-oko ni ori ọpọlọpo alubosa alágidi ni ibowọ onje ti ebi (kò jẹ ki ibowọ naa pe awọn ọpọ alubosa naa ba oju òkun). Ka'alẹ pẹlu ekan mẹta funfun nitorinaa. Sẹ alaisan ni ọkan igun ipo, tun le ṣẹrẹ pẹlu aro etu, sugar, ogufe, ila koko, akọkọ ati eko titun ti krushi nọxọ ni iye kuro ninu koko ile. Ka ninu apa ti paapọ.
tutorial3_challenge_brownie_step3: Step 3: Bake for 30 minutes or until a skewer wen you put am for betta belle mix, enta for middle, you go know say you no miss. Leave am make e cold kpa.
tutorial3_challenge_cookie_ingred5: 1 and ¾ кapк of plain flawa
tutorial3_challenge_cookie_step1: Step 1: Preheat oven to 180C or 160C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Using an electric mixer or whisking by hand, beat butter and sugars, and 1-2 minutes or until smooth and well combined. Beat in egg and vanilla until combined.
tutorial3_challenge_cookie_step2: Step 2: Stir in flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Roll 2 level tablespoonfuls of mixture into balls and place foron top of prepared trays, 3cm apart. Press down slightly. Decorate with extra chocolate chips.
tutorial3_challenge_cookie_step3: Step 3: Bake for 15-18 minutes or until light golden and cooked. Transfer to a wire rack to cool. Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week.
tutorial6_lesson_decs: These cover the gestures and actions needed to use the virtual keyboard through Talkback.
tutorial6_virtual_keyboard_part1_on_fini: Great job! Yo don type di word hello with di on screen keyboard. Congratulayshon sa you don complete dis lesson. For dis lesson you don achiev how to type with di on screen keyboard.
E be like say you neva tec di word hello. Double tap for di screen make di keyboard show. Tap for di backspace button sharply make you delete di word wey you type before. Try tec di word hello again.
tutorial6_virtual_keyboard_part1_intro: For dis tutorial, you go dey lrn how to open di on-screen virtual keyboard and type wit am.
tutorial6_virtual_keyboard_part1_intro2: Tọ start, dobọl tap on di skrẹn to ọpin di virtual keyboard.
tutorial6_virtual_keyboard_part1_on_show: Great job! You opened up the on screen virtual keyboard. Explore by touch to type hello using the keyboard.
tutorial6_challenge_intro: Welkam tu Lessоn 6 ku-tshallens. Fi dis ku-tshallen, yu wi ba ask tu send a mesidж tu yua frien, Bob, for inside chat rume. Na let's git startid.
tutorial6_challenge_fragment1_intro: To finish dis challenge send message to Bob n put him name for inside.
tutorial6_challenge_completion_message: You don successfully complete the lesson, now navigate back to tutorial 6.
gesture_minigame_wrong_gesture: Wrong Gesture. Try again. dey expect
tutorial4_intro: For dis tutorial, you go dey learn how to control media volume sliders to adjust volume. To start, find di play button den double tap to play di music.
tutorial4_increase_volume: Gret jọb! Na, go bạk tu dẹ slaịda n wẹca dẹ mẹdiạ voluọm ạbọv 75 bai swaịping ọp.
tutorial4_decrease_volume: Di voum 4 na sey abov 75. Now awa yo learn obout how to increse di voum we go try de reduce di voum below 25. To reduce di voum, swipe down.
tutorial4_outro: Current volume beluw 25. Congratulations on completing this lesson. I go send you back to lesson page.
